title: ABOUT ME
subtitle: Who is Lauri Kukkonen?
paragraphs: I’m an actor and ICT professional with over six years’ experience bridging technical delivery and human-centred problem solving.
My background in the arts gives me strong empathy, communication skills and a creative approach to complex problems.

I specialise in coordinating small end-to-end projects, improving stakeholder and vendor communication in multicultural teams, and troubleshooting legacy systems alongside developers. I learn new tools and domains quickly, keep team morale high under pressure, and focus on delivering clear, practical solutions that align product capabilities with real customer needs.I’m an actor and ICT professional with over six years’ experience bridging technical delivery and human-centred problem solving. My background in the arts gives me strong empathy, communication skills and a creative approach to complex problems. I specialise in coordinating small end-to-end projects, improving stakeholder and vendor communication in multicultural teams, and troubleshooting legacy systems alongside developers. I learn new tools and domains quickly, keep team morale high under pressure, and focus on delivering clear, practical solutions that align product capabilities with real customer needs.
